code: import UserActionTypes from'./userActionTypes';export var googleSignInStart=function googleSignInStart(){return{type:UserActionTypes.GOOGLE_SIGNIN_START};};export var emailSignInStart=function emailSignInStart(emailAndPassword){return{type:UserActionTypes.EMAIL_SIGNIN_START,payload:emailAndPassword};};export var signInSuccess=function signInSuccess(user){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGNIN_SUCCESS,payload:user};};export var signInFailure=function signInFailure(error){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGNIN_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var checkUserSession=function checkUserSession(){return{type:UserActionTypes.CHECK_USER_SESSION};};export var signOutStart=function signOutStart(){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_OUT_START};};export var signOutSuccess=function signOutSuccess(){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_OUT_SUCCESS};};export var signOutFailure=function signOutFailure(error){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_OUT_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var signUpStart=function signUpStart(userData){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGNUP_START,payload:userData};};export var signUpSuccess=function signUpSuccess(_ref){var user=_ref.user,additionalData=_ref.additionalData;return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGNUP_SUCCESS,payload:{user:user,additionalData:additionalData}};};export var signUpFailure=function signUpFailure(error){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGNUP_FAILURE,payload:error};};
